price: 2. Alle waa Kan ka soo saaray ummiyiinta2 dega (Makkah) dhexdood, Rasuul ka mid ah, u akhriyaya Aayadahiisa, daahiriniya,  barayana Kitaabka iyo Xikmadda, inkastoo horay u ahaayeen kuwo ku sugan habow cad.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي بَعَثَ فِي ٱلۡأُمِّيِّـۧنَ رَسُولٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ يَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُزَكِّيهِمۡ وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَإِن كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلُ لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
footnotes: 2. Ummiyiinta waxaa loola jeedaa Carabta oo ahaa kuwo aan wax akhrisan, heysan markaa Kitaab iyo Dhambaal Alle.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī baʿatha fī al-umiyīna rasūlan min'hum yatlū ʿalayhim āyātihi wayuzakkīhim wayuʿallimuhumu al-kitāba wal-ḥik'mata wa-in kānū min qablu lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
